name: Turnip Boy
description:
Stranded on a strange platform in the middle of the sea, Turnip Boy must survive by eating the food falling onto the platform. However, heavy objects are also falling, and he might get seriously hurt! How long can you survive?

(Inspired by the Game & Watch game, "Helmet")

This is my first game I've ever made in Unity. I've done 2D development for years, but this is my first time making a 3D game.

  • Controls: 
    • Select - Space
    • Exit - Escape
    • Move - WASD/UDLR
